divs: sighting detailsi was visiting my indiana hometown last week and while there positioned a bushnell hunter's cam in little eagle creek cemetary for friday's full moon night. as i've deduced there is a connection between ufo sightings and 40 degrees latitude, the graveyard is located 2,000 ft north of 151st street in carmel indiana, which is where 40 degrees latitude flows east\west. the cam was positioned in front of the mason's obelisk monument facing wsw. question is, did the rod emerge from or enter into the obelisk, as it's not captured in either in the preceding or succeeding pictures.
Summary: Rod captured in Indiana graveyard near 40 degrees latitude
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Indiana
There were no other sightings in Indiana on or around June 2nd 2012
